CustomField.description: Needs to be updated with target every quarter
CustomField.formula: Amount / (IF ( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c , 'UK'), 300000, IF ( CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c , 'SMB'), 7394000, IF (OR (CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c , 'MM'), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c , 'Mid Market')), 20000000, IF (OR (CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c , 'Enterprise'), CONTAINS(Owner_Role_Copy__c , 'Major')), 8000000, 0)))))
CustomField.label: Percentage Vertical Target
